name: QLPreviewReply
desc: The class you create when providing a data-based Quick Look preview extension.

items.name: init(fileURL: URL)
items.desc: Creates a preview reply from an existing file URL.

items.name: init(dataOfContentType: UTType, contentSize: CGSize, createDataUsing: (QLPreviewReply) -> Data)
items.desc: Creates a preview reply of a specified size and from a specified type by providing the data of the preview.

items.name: init(contextSize: CGSize, isBitmap: Bool, drawUsing: (CGContext, QLPreviewReply) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a preview reply of a specified size by drawing into a CoreGraphics context.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title for the system to display with the preview.

items.name: var attachments: [String : QLPreviewReplyAttachment]
items.desc: The attachments for a preview reply that provide additional data for the system to display the preview.

items.name: var stringEncoding: String.Encoding
items.desc: The string encoding used to parse the data you provide when creating the reply.
